title: Interpretation of seeing dates in a dream of any kind by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Appointment in a dream Appointment in a dream Dates from a dream are considered very important visions, as they carry many different interpretations and important messages for the dreamer. It is as if one sees in a dream that he is eating red dates at the specified time, then this indicates that he will gain many good things, but the interpretation of this vision varies. Depending on whether it is for a person, the fortune teller is male or female, or according to the situation in which the person saw the dates in the dream.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');A date in a dream. Seeing red dates in a dream for a married woman indicates marital happiness and understanding between the spouses and the extent of love and appreciation between them. Seeing the wet red color in a dream for an unmarried woman Married means that you are entering a new love story that will culminate in a successful marriage. The redness of the liquid in a pregnant woman’s dream can symbolize the birth of a beautiful girl. If one dreams alone that he is eating red dates, he will receive a promotion at work and a large financial reward. Al-Nabulsi says that anyone who sees Himself drenching the red color of a dead person during his sleep is a sign of success and excellence in his professional and social life. While eating red dates at a different time in the dream may indicate illness. Eating dates in a dream Dream interpretation jurists say that if one sees in a dream that he is eating dates in the form Ajwa, this means that he will acquire great wealth from many different sources. If one sees that he is eating dates, this indicates that he will obtain abundant livelihood. Ibn Sirin said that seeing the dreamer eating dates in a dream is evidence of his participation in a major project, and this project will succeed. He will make a lot of money from it. Therefore, this vision is good news for those who dream of life and wealth. As for Al-Nabulsi, he said: If the dreamer eats dough or dates, this indicates great wealth and fortune that the dreamer will acquire. A pregnant woman who eats dates in her dream indicates that she will give birth to a boy. Interpretation of a dream about red dates. If one sees himself eating red dates during their season, this indicates that he will marry a pure and honest woman. If he eats red dates outside of their season, this means that he will gain knowledge but will not act accordingly. Jurists said that seeing red dates in a dream is evidence of profit. And halal living. Imam Al-Nabulsi confirmed that the dreamer’s dream of red, spoiled, or rotten dates is evidence of a serious illness that he will suffer soon. If a single man sees red dates in his dream, this is evidence of his relationship with a pure and chaste girl. When the dreamer dreams of eating red dates at an unusual time, This vision confirms that the dreamer has acquired abundant knowledge, but has not benefited from it and used it optimally in his life. Interpretation of a dream about dates

title: Interpretation of buying a bedroom in a dream Seeing a bedroom in a dream

preview.html: The dream of buying a bedroom indicates your need for affection, security, and other interpretations. We will interpret this for the single person, for the married woman, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced woman, for the man, such as the dream of buying a new bedroom, or buying an old room from the furniture store, or entering the bedroom with the husband, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others in Interpretation of buying a bedroom in a dream: Seeing buying a bedroom in a dream is an indication of reaching the stage of psychological stability, comfort and security in which the dreamer will live. Whoever sees the bedroom in a dream, the vision indicates achieving goals and achieving them. A beautiful bedroom in a dream indicates that the dreamer He is a person who is loved by others. The interpretation of the large bedroom in the dream interpretation indicates achieving many profits and reaching ambitions that were difficult to achieve. Whoever sees that he entered the bedroom in a dream, the vision indicates that he will secure his life from evil people and enemies and defeat them.atOptions = { 'key ' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Interpretation of buying a bedroom in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Dream interpreter Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that buying a bedroom in your dream indicates that you want to be in the arms of your mother to enjoy security. Buying a bedroom in a dream for businessmen indicates that their career will witness great successes. Seeing an unmarried girl buying a bedroom in a dream means that she is about to get married. When a student dreams of buying a bedroom, it means that something happy will happen at school.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');The dream of an employee about buying a bedroom indicates the acquisition of wealth by exploiting more opportunities. This vision means the presence of new investment projects that are fraught with risks and profits are high and need to be prepared. Psychologically for profits and losses. To dream that you are buying a new bedroom means that recently you are more stubborn and it is difficult for you to accept the opinions of others, and you will have some minor disagreements with your colleagues and personal relationships will be strained. Buying a bedroom in a bachelor’s dream means that the relationship between you and your lover has changed a lot, and it has The actual emotional state changes as a result. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? title: Interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream for a single girl

preview.html: Interpretation of banknotes and paper money in an unmarried girl’s dream, whether she finds a loss, spends, gives, takes, and more according to Ibn Sirin. Meaning of paper money in one dream. Paper money in a dream is considered good because it expresses a successful deal or expresses a happy event such as marriage, Hajj, the return of a traveler, or buying a house. Or buying a new car, marrying a single man, or giving birth to a boy. The unmarried woman who takes notes gets married or has something of value such as gold, real estate, a car, or a house. The girl who takes coins or finds them faces many difficulties, whether with family or friends. The single girl whose wallet loses money, gets it stolen, or forgets it in a familiar place. This is a sign that she is wasting valuable opportunities and wasting her time. A single girl often dreams of money in her dreams and this has many indicators, whether she feels confused or insecure, or she is an ambitious girl who reaches long-term goals. If she finds banknotes in a dream, then your dream It foretells that you will face problems soon, and a feeling of relief and euphoria will follow. Spending paper money is a bad omen, and as for obtaining gold, it is a good omen. If you lose money, this symbolizes that you will face some difficulties at the family level or professional level. If your money is stolen, it means that you You are in danger and you must be careful. Saving money symbolizes prestige, wealth, and peace on the material level. In reality, if you spend borrowed money, this symbolizes that you will lose a dear friend due to deception. Interpretation of a dream about paper money by Ibn Sirin. Seeing paper money in a dream has different interpretations depending on receiving or finding money, especially if the vision Associated with money, it shows sustenance, whether with health or with children, and there are many different interpretations and indicators for this vision.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params': {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');The scholar Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in a dream an old red banknote, the vision may indicate that the dreamer is one of the righteous and sincere servants of God, and it appears The vision is that if the dreamer is negligent in his religion and performance. His duties are an indication of his commitment to prayer and his return to God’s straight path. However, if a person sees in a dream that he has lost his banknotes, the vision may indicate that he will lose one of his children and will not be able to perform religious duties such as Umrah and Hajj, while seeing a safe full of bank notes may indicate A lot of money that the dreamer will obtain through his inheritance or through his work. When a person sees in a dream a large number of bills, the vision may indicate the arrival of many means of obtaining money.

title: Interpretation of Friday prayer in a dream and seeing that I pray on Friday in a dream

preview.html: A dream about Friday prayer indicates joys, good deeds, and other interpretations, and we interpret it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a divorced man, like seeing someone praying on Friday. Church or performing Friday prayers with Muslims in the mosque according to Ibn Sirin and others: Interpretation of Friday prayers in a dream. Seeing Friday prayers in a dream for an unmarried girl is interpreted as a stable and quiet life, not tainted by any pressures. But if she sees herself praying on Friday among believers, This is good for her, and may indicate that a righteous husband will marry her, God willing.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : { } }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>'); As for a married woman seeing Friday prayers, it is evidence of obedience and regularity in performing her hours, and that she does not harm anyone with her tongue. And if she sees that she is performing the church prayer, a group of women is behind her. This is evidence of the good that will come to her, God willing, and confirms that she is a woman of good character and good for her husband. Perhaps it does not mean that she is fine. If a person is poor, seeing Friday prayers indicates his visit to the Sacred House of God, so he prays to God to complete it, and it may indicate that he heard good news about him and evidence of goodness and blessing. And happiness, because prayer prevents evil and immorality, and indicates the servant’s closeness to his Lord.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');And Friday prayer in a dream for a person in general indicates the stability of his life and the absence of any chaos in his life, because prayer does not bring anything but good, God willing. And Friday prayer in A dream for a pregnant woman indicates the safety of what is in her womb or that she will be blessed with good offspring and help him and her husband, especially if this woman in reality maintains performing Friday prayers in the mosque among women, and seeing her can also indicate the stability of her life after giving birth, especially if she is unstable. In general, seeing Friday prayers in a dream for a pregnant woman is a good thing and that she will give birth to a good child and be born safely, God willing.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? title: Interpretation of a dream about a fire in the Holy Mosque in Mecca in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a fire in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream. We will explain what scholars have provided in interpreting a dream of a fire in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream and other details that interest you according to the interpretations of the two scholars. Interpretation of a dream of a fire in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a fire in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream can be from Things that do not bode well, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a fire in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca, it may lead the dreamer to temptation, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees an explosion in the Grand Mosque of Mecca, it may represent the high cost of living, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a large explosion in the sanctuary could It also expresses the spread of strife, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about rain in the Mosque of Mecca in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about rain in the Mosque of Mecca in a dream could be an indication of goodness and sustenance, God willing. When a married man sees rain in the Mosque of Mecca, it may lead to repentance for sins and transgressions, by God. I know the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees rain in the Sacred Mosque in a dream, this is evidence of her closeness to God and good morals, and God knows best. If a married woman sees rain in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca, then she can express justice and nullify sins and transgressions, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream. The occurrence of her period during Umrah can express an inability to achieve goals, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees menstruation during Umrah, this may mean that she did not complete some matters properly. It is true, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing the beginning of the Umrah period can express failure in achieving success, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of entering the Sacred Mosque in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of entering the Sacred Mosque in a dream could be an indication of kindness and giving, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Where the entrance can be expressed The Sacred Mosque in Mecca is about halal food, and God knows the unseen. If a young man is seen entering the Sacred Mosque, he will have sustenance, and God Almighty knows. The vision of entering the Sacred Mosque can also express freedom from anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a funeral in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a funeral in the Sacred Mosque in a dream can That it leads to goodness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a funeral in the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream, this may indicate sustenance, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees the funeral prayer in the shrine, this may indicate the fulfillment of desires, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees the funeral In the shrine, it can express kindness and living, God willing. Interpretation of dreams to see absent prayer in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that sees the absence of prayer in a dream. Perhaps praying with people is absent for a living person. It can be interpreted as praying with them for his justice, and God knows the unseen. As it may indicate. On being questioned for his righteousness, and God knows best. In the event that a married man sees a prayer in absentia for an unknown person, he can resort to praying for Muslims, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees an absentee prayer for the dead, he may resort to praying for him and

Where the entrance can be expressed The Sacred Mosque in Mecca is about halal food, and God knows the unseen. If a young man is seen entering the Sacred Mosque, he will have sustenance, and God Almighty knows. The vision of entering the Sacred Mosque can also express freedom from anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a funeral in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a funeral in the Sacred Mosque in a dream can That it leads to goodness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a funeral in the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream, this may indicate sustenance, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees the funeral prayer in the shrine, this may indicate the fulfillment of desires, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees the funeral In the shrine, it can express kindness and living, God willing. Interpretation of dreams to see absent prayer in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that sees the absence of prayer in a dream. Perhaps praying with people is absent for a living person. It can be interpreted as praying with them for his justice, and God knows the unseen. As it may indicate. On being questioned for his righteousness, and God knows best. In the event that a married man sees a prayer in absentia for an unknown person, he can resort to praying for Muslims, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a skirt in a dream: Seeing a skirt in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a skirt indicates the arrival of goodness and the end of sadness, and other interpretations we interpret for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as wearing a dress. Skirt color is white, black, red, green, blue, pink, or buy a narrow skirt or a wide skirt, old, new or torn, by Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi. In the appendix to the following topic: Interpretation of a skirt in a dream. If you dreamed that you were wearing a skirt in a dream and it was new, this indicates goodness and wealth in your life. If you dreamed that you were wearing a skirt in a dream and tore it, then this dream indicates poverty. A red skirt in a dream shows the joy of life. And if You dreamed that you were wearing a green skirt in a dream, this is a sign of worship. If you dreamed that you were wearing a black skirt in a dream, this means money and power for those who are accustomed to it, and anxiety and sadness for those who are not accustomed to it. If you dream that you are wearing a pink skirt in a dream, this means life, love, and forgetting worries. Who do you think it is? Wearing? His skirt is white in the dream. The vision seemed very good to the major. Whoever sees in a dream that he is wearing a black skirt, and is not accustomed to wearing it, then a calamity or misfortune will occur. Likewise, whoever sees in a dream that she is wearing a red skirt while she is sick, then she will die, and if she is poor, she will be harmed. Everyone who He saw her being robbed and her skirt was stolen. She will be expelled, expelled from work, or expelled from the house. Whoever sees in a dream that he is wearing a linen skirt, he will have an honest life and legal money. Whoever sees that she is removing the dirty skirt from her body, this indicates the disappearance of anxiety. Whoever sees himself wearing a tight skirt, this indicates It indicates that it is not related to religion, that is, you may insist on prayer times or neglect studying the Qur’an and your thoughts wander to prayer. A tight skirt in a dream indicates a financial crisis. If you dream that you are wearing a backwards skirt, this indicates a reversal of things, such as something from which you may expect bad. And you find it good, or vice versa. Whoever sees in a dream that he is wearing an old skirt, if it is clean and elegant, this indicates the return of the relationship between two people after a separation or dispute that lasted for years. As for whoever sees himself wearing an old, torn skirt, this indicates illness, as well as the death of someone Loved ones or close ones. Whoever sees himself wearing a clean skirt in a dream is good news, because it is a sign of health, happiness and joy. Whoever is seen wearing a wide skirt shows abundance of livelihood. Whoever sees that she is wearing a tight skirt, then she takes it off and wears a wide skirt or a skirt suitable for her size, means that she She will go through a crisis and financial difficulties, but she will overcome them, God willing. Interpretation of wearing a skirt in a dream: A girl who sees in her dream that she is wearing a skirt or a short dress, then her vision indicates her negligence in acts of worship such as prayer, fasting, or charity. It indicates that the girl abandons reciting the Holy Qur’an in reality and then follows the path of truth and justice. The vision shows that one Men marry the girl with the vision, but that is not in line with the qualities of this girl. If the skirt or clothes are close

title: Interpretation of a dream about abortion for a pregnant and married woman in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of miscarriage in a dream or the miscarriage of a fetus in a dream indicates safety, and other interpretations that we will explain to the unmarried girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, and the divorced woman, such as the child falling from the pregnant woman without blood, or seeing the death of the fetus before birth by Ibn Sirin and others on: Interpretation of miscarriage in Seeing a miscarriage in a dream for a pregnant woman explains the completion of her birth, and miscarriage in a dream for a non-pregnant woman indicates the cessation of worries and freedom from worries, especially if seeing a miscarriage is twins in the dream, because twins indicate a large number of worries. A miscarriage can be the disclosure of secrets or a scandal if it is done. But if a woman dreams of seeing a miscarriage in a dream, but the abortion was done through surgery, then this dream indicates that she was telling someone her secrets and that this person has revealed All her secrets. title: Interpretation of a dream about a toothless comb

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a toothless comb in a dream We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about a toothless comb in a dream. It is one of the very disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must forbid that and not believe in it completely, because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who They seek to reach the truth, and he makes mistakes and may be right, in addition to the fact that the site and its managers have nothing to do with the site. Interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a toothless comb in a dream. Seeing a toothless comb in a dream may indicate a problem that the person having the vision may face in his life, and God knows best. In the event that a person sees that the comb is without teeth, this may indicate an inability to achieve desires and dreams, and accordingly To ask for God’s help. Whoever sees in a dream that the comb was without teeth may indicate some material obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life at that time. If one sees a toothless comb in a dream, this may indicate the presence of some problems and disagreements that The dreamer cannot get rid of them, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a comb falling in a dream: A comb falling in a dream may indicate the disappointment that the dreamer feels from some people. If a person sees that he is carrying a comb and it falls from it, this may indicate that he suffered severe pain in His life at that time. Seeing a comb falling in a dream may indicate the loss of rights and judgments that the dreamer may be exposed to, and God knows best. Seeing a comb falling in a dream may mean that he heard bad news during this period and needs to ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a hair comb in A dream: Cleaning a comb from the hair in a dream may indicate a new opportunity that the dreamer may gain during this period. In the case of my personal view that he is cleaning the comb, this may indicate positive changes occurring in the life of the dreamer during that period, thanks to God. If one sees that He combs his hair and cleans the comb after it, as this may indicate a great benefit that the dreamer may obtain during this period, thanks to God. A dream about cleaning a comb from the hair may indicate the release of worries and pains that the dreamer has suffered from for a period of time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the teeth of a comb falling out in A dream: The teeth of a comb falling out in a dream may indicate the loss of a person or his upcoming trip. Seeing the teeth of a comb falling out in a dream may indicate the loss of dreams and ambitions for the dreamer, and he must seek God’s help. Seeing the teeth of a comb falling out in a dream may indicate the presence of some problems and difficulties in the dreamer’s life. During this period. In case the person sees that the teeth of the comb are falling out, this may indicate the distance of worries and problems in your life. The person who has the vision and needs to ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about someone giving me a comb in a dream. Seeing someone giving the visionary a comb may indicate valid testimony. The dreamer presents it to that person. If the dreamer sees someone giving him a comb, this may indicate that there is someone warning him about a problem or danger to which he is exposed. If he sees someone giving him a comb, this may indicate knowledge

title: Interpretation of a girl’s wedding in a dream or seeing my friend getting married in a dream

preview.html: The dream of my friend getting married shows his livelihood and earnings at work and other interpretations that we will explain to single, married, pregnant, divorced, and male people, such as seeing my friend getting married, or wearing a wedding dress, or getting engaged to my friend, a joyful marriage or a friend’s marriage to Ibn Sirin and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of my friend’s wedding In a dream, it indicates the wedding of a friend in a dream. Anxiety and anxiety usually control the dreamer’s life in reality, and marriage and engagement may symbolize the restrictions that bind the dreamer’s movements and actions in reality. A friend’s wedding in a dream, if it is quiet and devoid of dancing and music, it also bodes well and good living. A friend’s wedding in a dream, if it is noisy , they portend the occurrence of problems with the fortuneteller in reality. If the dreamer witnesses the wedding of a friend or girlfriend, this is evidence of the conclusion of a well-thought-out and profitable business deal, while the wedding of a married friend in a dream means the dreamer’s true desire to marry again in reality. Seeing a marriage is considered The friend from an old woman is unfavorable, as she tells the viewer that he is actually losing money. Seeing a friend's wedding in a dream expresses that the person is going through some positive developments that will greatly affect his life financially and morally. A friend's wedding in your dream also indicates that this friend is having a good time and receiving great news. According to another interpretation, it denotes a beautiful event, and indicates success and obtaining a wonderful share. However, some details must be paid attention to in such a dream, and if an example were to be given, seeing a black wedding dress expresses the bad news that the person will receive.
